"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540624086368723bd2e80000#post_540624086368723bd2e80000
I hate washing dishes...
So I have a built in dish washer.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540624386368724ca1ea0100#post_540624386368724ca1ea0100

I don't mind washing the dishes, in fact, I actually liked it because I tend to get lost in my thoughts and before I realized, they're already done... Then I see the ones used for cooking and something in me dies.

I do remember my parents considering having a dish washer, but the water bills would increase a lot.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
I personally don't mind washing dishes; what annoys me though and I hate is mowing the lawn.  My ideal house would have a very little yard.

I know it's about Touhou, but I know a lot of people like music here.  You have to give credit where it's due; having a palindrome song(song that is the same backwards and forwards) is pretty difficult to do.
"ygoloedI esreveR":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wEa3JiYselk
"lriG iakuoY s'nnamtraH":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fpHGyRZkgRs
